item.title: Before the Non-Farm Payrolls (NFP) release, the probability of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in September is 34%.
item.description: On July 30th, according to CME's "FedWatch": The likelihood of the Fed keeping interest rates unchanged in July is 97.9%, and the likelihood of a 25-basis-point rate cut is 2.1%.The likelihood of the Fed maintaining interest rates in September is 34.0%. The cumulative likelihood of a 25-basis-point rate cut is 64.7%, and the cumulative likelihood of a 50-basis-point rate cut is 1.4%.

item.title: A whale withdrew 20,000 ETH from a CEX and subsequently deposited 16,000 ETH into Aave V3.
item.description: On July 30th, as monitored by Onchain Lens, within the past 2 hours, a whale address withdrew 20,000 ETH (valued at $75.56 million) from Binance. Subsequently, it deposited 16,000 ETH (worth $60 million) into Aave V3.

item.title: U.S. July "Nonfarm Payrolls" data will be released in 5 minutes
item.description: At 30th July, the U.S. July "Mini Non-Farm" ADP Employment Numbers will be released in ten minutes.Expectation: 75,000. Previous Value: -33,000.

item.title: Trump: Imposes 25% Tariff on India
item.description: On July 30th, Trump declared that starting from August 1st, India would be required to pay a 25% tariff and a fine. Trump further stated that India was being fined due to its purchases from Russia. (FX168)

item.title: Entity: The Dollar Could Rise on US GDP Data and Fed Decision
item.description: July 30th. Analysts at Monex Europe indicated in a report that if the forthcoming US economic growth data exhibits strength and Federal Reserve Chair Powell adopts a cautious stance towards rate cuts in the subsequent decision, the US dollar may continue to rise. The US second-quarter economic growth data will be disclosed at 20:30 (Beijing time), and the Fed's policy decision will be announced at 02:00 the following day, with the interest rate expected to remain unaltered.Nevertheless, the analysts pointed out that the upside potential of the US dollar is likely to be constrained. They stated that the rise of the dollar earlier this week appears to be more associated with position adjustments prior to key events rather than a fundamental re-evaluation of its value. (FXStreet)

item.title: In the last 24 hours, CEX net outflow of 15,693.17 BTC
item.description: On July 30th, according to Coinglass data, within the past 24 hours, CEX had a cumulative net outflow of 15,693.17 BTC. The top three CEX with the largest outflow amounts are as follows:· Binance, with an outflow of 5,803.17 BTC;· Coinbase Pro, with an outflow of 5,705.44 BTC;· Bitfinex, with an outflow of 3,922.08 BTC.In addition, Bithumb witnessed an inflow of 653.56 BTC and ranked first on the inflow list.

item.title: If Bitcoin falls below $116,000, the mainstream CEX liquidation pressure will reach $1.331 billion.
item.description: On July 30th, based on Coinglass data, if Bitcoin drops below $116,000, the cumulative intensity of long liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $1.331 billion.Conversely, if Bitcoin exceeds $119,000, the cumulative intensity of short liquidation on mainstream CEXs will reach $735 million.BlockBeats Notes: The liquidation chart does not precisely show the number of contracts awaiting liquidation or the exact value of contracts being liquidated. The bars on the liquidation chart actually represent the significance of each liquidation cluster in relation to neighboring clusters, that is, intensity.Therefore, the liquidation chart shows to what extent the price of the underlying asset will be affected when reaching a certain level. A higher "liquidation bar" indicates that the price reaching that point will trigger a more intense reaction due to a liquidity cascade.

item.title: Trump: Tariffs Final Deadline Will Not Be Extended
item.description: On July 30th, US President Trump stated on social media: "The deadline of August 1st is the deadline of August 1st - firm as a rock and not eligible for extension. This is a significant day for America!!! (Golden Ten)."

item.title: OKX Quarterly Proof of Reserves #33: Total Value of BTC, ETH, USDT, and USDC Reaches $28.8 Billion
item.description: On July 30th, as per official channels, OKX released the 33rd Proof of Reserves (PoR). There is a 100% reserve rate for 22 listed assets. Specifically, the reserve rates for BTC, ETH, USDT, and USDC are 106%, 101%, 103%, and 100% respectively, with a total value of $28,815,134,660.It is reported that OKX is the first platform in the industry to achieve continuous PoR releases for more than two years. During this period, OKX has been releasing PoR on a monthly basis. The number of listed assets has increased from 3 to 22. OKX has successively upgraded the PoR system using technologies such as Merkle Tree, Merkle Mountain Range, and zk-STARK in order to enhance the transparency of user assets.

item.title: Mantle: Total ETH and Derivative ETH Holdings Reach 101,867 Coins
item.description: On July 30th, the Ethereum Layer 2 network Mantle disclosed its Ethereum reserve data on the X platform. As of now, the holdings consist of 101,867 ETH and mETH, with an approximate value of $388 million. This encompasses ETH (4,454), mETH (77,218), and ETH in MI4 (20,195).
